page_content:
Census taking in Ghana
Population Censuses have been conducted in Ghana at approximately ten-year intervals since 1891.  Ghana has conducted six population Censuses after independence – 2021 was the last.  The last three Censuses (2000, 2010 and 2021) combined Population and Housing in one operation.  The last Census conducted in 2021 recorded a total population of 30.8 million.
